segments.text: May you DROP Doom 3 Online domain name!,
Right click a landmark in a green sprite to convert it to this domain name.
To enterspace I will drop a handle in the same folder as the telemetry co-operative DTS
Be sure to log-in to your e3 driver before this paragraph, but whenever Amitabh Action
answers this question, save it in your travel folder and that will detect the translation
